query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS bot_metrics (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  metric_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  metric_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  metric_value INT NOT NULL,
  metadata TEXT,
  recorded_at DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_metric_type (metric_type),
  INDEX idx_recorded_at (recorded_at)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user waCuRew5RKYFFjj.root --database DS68jwRuNTWiz9tNrw6KXW --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS bot_metrics (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  metric_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  metric_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  metric_value INT NOT NULL,
  metadata TEXT,
  recorded_at DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_metric_type (metric_type),
  INDEX idx_recorded_at (recorded_at)
)
